about.description: Hi üëã, main Shivesh hoon. Merepe 6+ saal ka full stack dev ka experience hai in ‚Äì cloud native microservices, web & mobile apps. Maine BITS se M.Tech (Software Engineering) aur GGSIPU se B.Tech (Electronics & Comm) ki hai. Neeche kuch sahi open source hobby projects jarur dekhna jo maine banaye hain.
about.quote: "Ek accha engineer hamesha one-way street cross karne se pehle dono taraf dekhta hai."
